name: RevitLookupWpf
description: Interactive Revit RFA and RVT project database exploration tool to view and navigate BIM element parameters, properties and relationships.The project was developed to support programmers using RevitAPI to quickly look up and work efficiently with parameter objects.
contents: Init - Init Revitlookup Assembly, SnoopActiveView - Allow Snoop Active View In Document Current, SnoopByElementId - Allow Snoop By Input Is ElementId (integer), SnoopCurrentSelection - Snoop Element Selected In Revit, SnoopDocument - Allow User Snoop Document Current, SnoopElement - Snoop Element In Revit, SnoopFace - Allow User Snoop Current Surface In Dynamo, SnoopObject - Allow Snoop Object Undefine
